content:
Holly drinks juice while she drives to work each day.

She recorded the amount of juice she drank (in milliliters) and how long (in minutes) her drive took for five days this week.
  
|||||
:-- | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --:
**Juice (mL)** | $100$ | $200$ | $150$ | $125$ | $225$
**Time (min)** | $18$ | $14$ | $15$ | $20$ | $12$ 
  
**Plot the data in a scatterplot.**
